feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 01:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: ENE 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
